docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Services
docs.text: Odiplus Investment offers general services with a growing focus on:

docs.title: Construction (Planned Registration)
docs.text:
• Building and renovation support
  • General maintenance
  • Site support services

docs.title: Supplies (Planned Registration)
docs.text:
• Office and operational supplies
  • Building materials support
  • General procurement support

docs.title: Farming (Planned Registration)
docs.text:
• Crop and field support (seasonal)
  • Farm support services
  • Agricultural supply support

More services will be added as the company expands. EOF

cat > docs/about.md <<'EOF'

docs.title: About Odiplus Investment
docs.text: Odiplus Investment is a Botswana-based general services company. We are building a strong foundation to expand into construction, supplies, and farming services as part of our growth plan.

docs.title: Contact
docs.text:
For enquiries, quotations, or partnerships:

  • Phone / WhatsApp: +267 __
  • Email: __@______
  • Location: Botswana

Contact details will be updated as the website evolves. EOF
